snippet: The fire in the Colorado Springs suburb of Black Forest nearly doubled in size overnight and has forced nearly 40,000 people to flee the area.
abstract: Wildfire in the Colorado Springs, Colo, suburb of Black Forest nearly doubles in size overnight and has forced nearly 40,000 people to flee the area; 360 homes have been destroyed, and two bodies have been found.

byline.contributor: Dan Frosch contributed reporting from Denver.

lead_paragraph: The fire in the Colorado Springs suburb of Black Forest nearly doubled in size overnight and has forced nearly 40,000 people to flee the area.

headline.main: Toll of Homes Destroyed in Colorado Wildfire Rises to Hundreds; 2 Bodies Found
headline.print_headline: Toll of Homes Destroyed in Colorado Wildfire Rises to Hundreds; 2 Bodies Found
